text: yaqinan aap imaan waalo ka sab se zyaada dushman yahodiyo aur mushriko ko payenge, aur imaan waalo se sab se zyaada dosti ke qareeb aap yaqinan unhe payenge jo apne aap ko nasaara kehte hai, ye is liye ke un mein ulema aur ibaadath ke liye gosha nasheen afraadh paaye jaate hai, aur us wajeh se ke wo takabbur nahi karte
